listings.Program Description: The Bachelor of Science in Physics at AUS focuses on giving students hands-on experience, working with world-class professors in state-of-the-art laboratories. Our physics faculty are involved in cutting-edge projects, including the UAE’s 2021 Mars mission and the development of a laser-based technique that can provide new insights into the diagnosis and treatment of diseases. The program seeks to provide graduates with a solid educational foundation in physics with an interdisciplinary emphasis that encompasses knowledge from other disciplines such as mathematics, natural sciences, engineering, and liberal arts.
